#include<vector>
#include<string>
#include<algorithm>
#include<iostream>
#include <fstream>
#include<iomanip>
#include<cmath>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cstdio>
#include<stack>
#include<cstring>
#include<map>
#include<set>
#include<queue>  
using namespace std;
#define MOD 1000000007
int main()
{
	ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);cin.tie(0);
	int i,n;
	int flag=1;
	string s;
	double a,f;
	double now=0;
	cin>>n;
	cin>>s;
	cin>>a>>f;
	for(i=0;i<n;i++)
	{
		if(s[i]=='L')
			now-=a;
		else
			now+=a;
		if(fabs(now)>f)
			flag=0;
	}
	if(flag)
		cout<<"YES"<<endl;
	else
		cout<<"NO"<<endl;
	//system("pause");
	return 0;
}
